name: imstranger
fullText:
$WKSP is developing tech that aligns with major OEM supply chains.
Mentions of Ford, RAM, Rivian? Not random — it’s about compatibility and positioning.
This is how B2B deals often begin: R&D → pilot → potential expansion.
And OEM interest can be a major driver of visibility. https://t.co/5Ko4YZlHlD

name: rebeccaadagdagan
fullText:
Let break down the numbers:
WKSP 2024 revenue estimate is approximately $10M.
2025 guidance projects $20–25M.
This reflects significant growth and expanding scale.
The company currently operates 3 product lines,
has secured government business,
and built production capacity.
This https://t.co/Fkuzay4zZE

name: Katherine Patrick
fullText:
